rukus.text: alam tara ila alladhina nafaqu yaquluna li-ikh'wanihimu alladhina kafaru min ahli l-kitabi la-in ukh'rij'tum lanakhrujanna maʿakum wala nutiʿu fikum ahadan abadan wa-in qutil'tum lanansurannakum wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakadhibuna
la-in ukh'riju la yakhrujuna maʿahum wala-in qutilu la yansurunahum wala-in nasaruhum layuwallunna l-adbara thumma la yunsaruna
la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fi sudurihim mina l-lahi dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
la yuqatilunakum jamiʿan illa fi quran muhassanatin aw min warai judurin basuhum baynahum shadidun tahsabuhum jamiʿan waqulubuhum shatta dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la yaʿqiluna
kamathali alladhina min qablihim qariban dhaqu wabala amrihim walahum ʿadhabun alimun
kamathali l-shaytani idh qala lil'insani uk'fur falamma kafara qala inni barion minka inni akhafu l-laha rabba l-ʿalamina
fakana ʿaqibatahuma annahuma fi l-nari khalidayni fiha wadhalika jazau l-zalimina
